original_title: First to 100 (or Once Upon a Time... at the Billiards Table)
overview: A friendly game of billiards between two masters of the sport becomes an epic showdown of unexpected proportions.
tagline: A friendly game of billiards between two masters of the sport becomes an epic showdown of unexpected proportions.
title: First to 100 (or Once Upon a Time... at the Billiards Table)
